data.text: So he kept churning out movies. One after another. He won Razzies, even, for how terrible critics deemed his recent work. People made fun of him. They mocked him. Thought he was just someone soullessly making movie after movie only for the money. They did not dig into the reasons behind it. And that’s tragic. Bruce Willis didn’t want to make the sort of cutting-edge, deep, well-acted movies that’d require him to endlessly repeat takes… no, he wanted to get done quick, and be home again with his loved ones. Minimal effort, maximum reward, until the moment his condition deteriorated to the point where he no longer could.
data.translation: 所以他继续拍电影，一部接一部。他甚至还因为近期作品受到的糟糕评价而赢得了金酸莓奖。人们嘲笑他，讥讽他，认为他只是为了钱，毫无灵魂地机械制作电影。他们没有深入探究背后的原因。这真是悲哀。布鲁斯·威利斯并不想拍那种需要他一遍又一遍地重复拍摄的前沿、深刻、表演精湛的电影……不，他想快速完成拍摄，再回到他所爱的人身边。尽最小的努力，获得最大的回报，直到他的病情恶化到他无法继续为止。

data.text: We then desperately looked for a place to eat but it was now getting late. Google Maps led us to one place and upon arriving it had changed hands and now only seemed to serve pizzas. There were no customers in the place. We had parked outside a Thai restaurant on the way here. We noticed it was jam-packed with customers. We went in. The decor was plain and simple, actually pretty ordinary. But the food was superb. It was a bring your own drinks and had a bottle shop next door. Turned out to be a great meal at less than half the price we would have spent. The locals knew it which is why it was crowded.
data.translation: 我们迫切地在找寻吃饭的地方，但现在已经很晚了。我们根据谷歌地图的指引来到了某一个地方，结果那里已经转让了，现在只是售卖汉堡包的地方。那里并没有任何顾客。我们早前在路上经过一家泰国餐厅，看到那里几乎是座无虚席的大厅。我们进去后发现，装修非常简单，甚至平淡无奇。但是菜品却很棒，而且是自带饮料，还有一家酒吧附近。我们发现，这里的菜品价格比其他地方便宜得多，而且味道也非常好。当地人都知道这里，所以这里总是挤满了顾客。

data.text: Large language models (LLMs) are applied to all sorts of creative tasks, and their outputs vary from beautiful, to peculiar, to pastiche, into plain plagiarism. The temperature parameter of an LLM regulates the amount of randomness, leading to more diverse outputs; therefore, it is often claimed to be the creativity parameter. Here, we investigate this claim using a narrative generation task with a predetermined fixed context, model and prompt. Specifically, we present an empirical analysis of the LLM output for different temperature values using four necessary conditions for creativity in narrative generation: novelty, typicality, cohesion, and coherence. We find that temperature is weakly correlated with novelty, and unsurprisingly, moderately correlated with incoherence, but there is no relationship with either cohesion or typicality. However, the influence of temperature on creativity is far more nuanced and weak than suggested by the "creativity parameter" claim; overall results suggest that the LLM generates slightly more novel outputs as temperatures get higher. Finally, we discuss ideas to allow more controlled LLM creativity, rather than relying on chance via changing the temperature parameter.
data.translation: 大型语言模型（LLMs）应用于各种创意任务，产出包括美丽、奇特、拼贴，甚至直接抄袭等多样性成果。LLM 的温度参数调控输出的随机性，使输出更加多样化；因此，它通常被认为是控制创造力的参数。在本研究中，我们通过设定特定的固定环境、模型和提示，进行了叙事生成任务来探究这一理论。具体而言，我们针对不同温度设置下的LLM输出进行了实证分析，依据叙事创造中必需的四个条件：新颖性、典型性、凝聚力和连贯性。研究结果显示，温度与新颖性的相关性较弱，也符合预期地与不连贯性中度相关，但与凝聚力或典型性无显著相关性。然而，温度对创造力的影响远比“创造力参数”所声称的更为微妙和有限。总体结果表明，随着温度的升高，LLM产生的新颖性略有提升。最后，我们探讨了通过更为控制的方式激发LLM创造力的可能性，而不仅仅依赖于通过调整温度参数来增加随机性。

data.translation: 大规模语言模型（LLM）在各种创造性任务中都有着广泛的应用，其输出的内容从美丽到怪异再到著名的复制粘贴作品都有，而且这些作品的质量各有不同。因此，很多人将温度参数称为创造力的参数，因为该参数可调节随机性程度，从而导致输出的形式多样化。在本文中，我们将通过一项定义了预先确定的语言背景、模型和激励语句的故事创作任务来考察这一假设。我们的研究发现，温度参数与创造性的四个必要条件之间存在弱相关性：新颖性、典型性、连贯性和协调性。温度参数与新颖性的相关性很弱，但与协调性和连贯性的相关性都较强，但与典型性的相关性却是微弱的。然而，温度参数对创造性的影响并不像“创造力参数”这一说法所暗示的那样简单明了，而且影响力并不强。总体来说，随着温度的升高，LLM输出的内容变得更加新颖。最后，我们讨论了如何通过减少随机性的方式来控制LLM的创造性，而不是完全依靠温度参数。

评估显示我们的协议显著优于传统方法，尤其是在客户端掉线率高达30％和模型大小达到$10^6$参数的情况下。

data.text: Decentralized learning (DL) offers a novel paradigm in machine learning by distributing training across clients without central aggregation, enhancing scalability and efficiency. However, DL's peer-to-peer model raises challenges in protecting against inference attacks and privacy leaks. By forgoing central bottlenecks, DL demands privacy-preserving aggregation methods to protect data from 'honest but curious' clients and adversaries, maintaining network-wide privacy. Privacy-preserving DL faces the additional hurdle of client dropout, clients not submitting updates due to connectivity problems or unavailability, further complicating aggregation.   This work proposes three secret sharing-based dropout resilience approaches for privacy-preserving DL. Our study evaluates the efficiency, performance, and accuracy of these protocols through experiments on datasets such as MNIST, Fashion-MNIST, SVHN, and CIFAR-10. We compare our protocols with traditional secret-sharing solutions across scenarios, including those with up to 1000 clients. Evaluations show that our protocols significantly outperform conventional methods, especially in scenarios with up to 30% of clients dropout and model sizes of up to $10^6$ parameters. Our approaches demonstrate markedly high efficiency with larger models, higher dropout rates, and extensive client networks, highlighting their effectiveness in enhancing decentralized learning systems' privacy and dropout robustness.
data.translation: 去中心化学习（DL）通过在不涉及中心聚合的情况下分布式训练，为机器学习提供了一种新范式，增强了可扩展性和效率。然而，DL 的点对点模型在防止推断攻击和隐私泄露方面存在挑战。DL 放弃中心瓶颈的同时，要求使用保护隐私的聚合方法来保护数据免受"诚实但好奇"的客户和对手的侵害，维护网络范围内的隐私。保护隐私的 DL 还面临客户端掉线的额外障碍，即由于连接问题或不可用性，客户端不提交更新，这进一步增加了聚合的复杂性。本研究提出了三种基于秘密共享的抗掉线方法来保护隐私的 DL。我们通过在 MNIST、Fashion-MNIST、SVHN 和 CIFAR-10 等数据集上的实验来评估这些协议的效率、性能和准确性。我们将我们的协议与传统的秘密共享解决方案进行比较，包括最多有1000个客户端的场景。评估显示我们的协议显著优于传统方法，尤其是在客户端掉线率高达30％和模型大小达到$10^6$参数的情况下。我们的方法在更大的模型、更高的掉线率和广泛的客户网络中展示出显著的高效率，突出了它们在提高去中心化学习系统的隐私和抗掉线能力方面的有效性。

data.text: Decentralized learning (DL) offers a novel paradigm in machine learning by distributing training across clients without central aggregation, enhancing scalability and efficiency. However, DL's peer-to-peer model raises challenges in protecting against inference attacks and privacy leaks. By forgoing central bottlenecks, DL demands privacy-preserving aggregation methods to protect data from 'honest but curious' clients and adversaries, maintaining network-wide privacy. Privacy-preserving DL faces the additional hurdle of client dropout, clients not submitting updates due to connectivity problems or unavailability, further complicating aggregation.   This work proposes three secret sharing-based dropout resilience approaches for privacy-preserving DL. Our study evaluates the efficiency, performance, and accuracy of these protocols through experiments on datasets such as MNIST, Fashion-MNIST, SVHN, and CIFAR-10. We compare our protocols with traditional secret-sharing solutions across scenarios, including those with up to 1000 clients. Evaluations show that our protocols significantly outperform conventional methods, especially in scenarios with up to 30% of clients dropout and model sizes of up to $10^6$ parameters. Our approaches demonstrate markedly high efficiency with larger models, higher dropout rates, and extensive client networks, highlighting their effectiveness in enhancing decentralized learning systems' privacy and dropout robustness.
data.translation: 分布式学习（DL）提供了一种新的机器学习模式，通过将训练分散到用户端，而无需进行中心化汇总，从而提高了可扩展性和效率。然而，DL的 P2P 模式却面临着保护预测攻击和隐私泄漏的挑战。为了跳过中心化瓶颈，保护数据免受“好奇心旺盛但又坦诚”的用户和敌对方的侵犯，DL 需要采用隐私保护措施，通过对数据进行匿名汇总，维护网络范围内的隐私。保护隐私的 DL 面临着另一个挑战，那就是因为网络连接问题或者资源不足，使得客户端退出困难，从而降低了整个系统的可扩展性。本文提出了三种基于秘密共享的退出抗拒攻击的方法，并通过对 MNIST、Fashion-MNIST、SVHN 和 CIFAR-10 数据集进行实验，评估了这些方法的效率、性能和准确性。实验结果显示，这些方法在大型模型、高退出率以及网络规模较大的情况下，都表现出了极高的效率和可扩展性。

data.translation: 分布式学习（Decentralized Learning，DL）为机器学习提供了一种全新的框架，它在不使用集中采样的情况下，将训练数据分散在客户端上，从而提高了训练数据的可扩展性和效率。然而，DL的分布式模型存在防止推断攻击和保护隐私的挑战。由于忽视了中心化瓶颈，DL需要使用保护数据免受“善意但好奇”客户和敌对者的侵害的隐私保护协议。为了克服客户断线或不可用等因素造成的数据不完整性，我们提出了三种基于密钥共享的数据损失抵抗方法，用于保护隐私。我们通过对MNIST、Fashion-MNIST、SVHN和CIFAR-10等数据集的实验评估了这些方法的性能、效率和准确性，并与传统密钥共享方法进行了比较。结果表明，我们的方法与传统方法相比在各种情况下都表现出明显优势，特别是在客户数量达到30%的情况下，并且模型参数规模达到10万个。这些方法在大型模型、高退出率客户以及大规模客户网络中表现出明显的高效性，彰显了其对分布式学习系统的隐私和退出率抗性的有效性。

data.translation: 分散式學習（DL）提供了機器學習中全新的範式，通過在客戶端分散訓練而無需中心化聚合，提升了可擴展性和效率。然而，DL的點對點模型中出現的挑戰在於如何保護數據免受推理攻擊和隱私洩露。由於DL拋棄了中心化瓶頸，因此必須使用保護隱私的聚合方法，以抵禦"單純好奇"的客戶和對手的嘗試，以保持整個網絡的隱私。保護隱私的DL還需面對客戶輟學等問題，即客戶由於連接問題或不可用而未提交更新，進一步增加了聚合的複雜性。該研究提出了基於秘密共享的三種應對輟學的強韌性方法，用以保護隱私的DL。我們通過在MNIST、Fashion-MNIST、SVHN和CIFAR-10等數據集上進行實驗，對這些協議的效率、性能和準確性進行了評估。我們將我們的協議與傳統的秘密共享解決方案進行了比較，包括最多含有1000個客戶的情境。評估表明，在各種情況下，我們的協議明顯優於傳統方法，尤其是當客戶輟學率高達30％，模型參數達到$10^6$的情況下。我們的方法在處理更大型模型、更高輟學率和更廣泛客戶網絡時展現出卓越的高效性，凸顯了它們在增進分散式學習系統隱私和輟學耐受性方面的有效性。

data.text: Decentralized learning (DL) offers a novel paradigm in machine learning by distributing training across clients without central aggregation, enhancing scalability and efficiency. However, DL's peer-to-peer model raises challenges in protecting against inference attacks and privacy leaks. By forgoing central bottlenecks, DL demands privacy-preserving aggregation methods to protect data from 'honest but curious' clients and adversaries, maintaining network-wide privacy. Privacy-preserving DL faces the additional hurdle of client dropout, clients not submitting updates due to connectivity problems or unavailability, further complicating aggregation.   This work proposes three secret sharing-based dropout resilience approaches for privacy-preserving DL. Our study evaluates the efficiency, performance, and accuracy of these protocols through experiments on datasets such as MNIST, Fashion-MNIST, SVHN, and CIFAR-10. We compare our protocols with traditional secret-sharing solutions across scenarios, including those with up to 1000 clients. Evaluations show that our protocols significantly outperform conventional methods, especially in scenarios with up to 30% of clients dropout and model sizes of up to $10^6$ parameters. Our approaches demonstrate markedly high efficiency with larger models, higher dropout rates, and extensive client networks, highlighting their effectiveness in enhancing decentralized learning systems' privacy and dropout robustness.
data.translation: 分布式学习（DL）在机器学习中提供了一个新的范式，通过在没有中央聚合的客户端之间分布训练来提高可扩展性和效率。但是，由于 DL 采用了 peer-to-peer 模型，对抗泄露攻击和隐私泄露的挑战很大。通过消除中央瓶颈，DL 需要隐私保护的聚合方法，以保护数据免受“诚实但好奇”的客户和敌人的侵害，维持整个网络的隐私。隐私保护的 DL 面临额外的障碍，即客户端断线或不可用，进一步增加了聚合的复杂性。本文提出了三种基于秘密共享的断线鲁棒性方法，用于隐私保护的 DL。我们通过对 MNIST、Fashion-MNIST、SVHN 和 CIFAR-10 等数据集的实验来评估这些协议的效率、性能和准确性。我们与传统的秘密共享解决方案在多种场景中进行了比较，包括具有 1000 个客户端的场景。评估结果显示，我们的协议明显优于传统方法，尤其是具有 30% 客户端断线和模型规模达到 $10^6$ 个参数的场景。我们的方法在增大模型、增加断线率和广泛客户端网络的情况下表现出了显著高效率，强调了它们在增强分布式学习系统的隐私和断线鲁棒性方面的有效性。

data.text: Missing value imputation is a crucial preprocessing step for many machine learning problems. However, it is often considered as a separate subtask from downstream applications such as classification, regression, or clustering, and thus is not optimized together with them. We hypothesize that treating the imputation model and downstream task model together and optimizing over full pipelines will yield better results than treating them separately. Our work describes a novel AutoML technique for making downstream predictions with missing data that automatically handles preprocessing, model weighting, and selection during inference time, with minimal compute overhead. Specifically we develop M-DEW, a Dynamic missingness-aware Ensemble Weighting (DEW) approach, that constructs a set of two-stage imputation-prediction pipelines, trains each component separately, and dynamically calculates a set of pipeline weights for each sample during inference time. We thus extend previous work on dynamic ensemble weighting to handle missing data at the level of full imputation-prediction pipelines, improving performance and calibration on downstream machine learning tasks over standard model averaging techniques. M-DEW is shown to outperform the state-of-the-art in that it produces statistically significant reductions in model perplexity in 17 out of 18 experiments, while improving average precision in 13 out of 18 experiments.
data.translation: 在机器学习问题的处理中，填充缺失值是一个关键的预处理步骤。然而，往往将其视为与下游应用（如分类、回归或聚类）分开处理的一个子任务。由于如此，在优化过程中，这一步骤通常不会被同时考虑。我们推测，将预处理模型和下游应用模型合并优化，并在执行时对全部流程进行优化，会比单独处理这两个模型更有效。本文介绍了一种新型自动机器学习技术，用于在执行时处理缺失数据，该技术会自动处理预处理、模型权重和选择等步骤，并在执行时对每个样本进行动态模型权重计算。我们将此技术称为动态缺失值模型重分配（M-DEW），它基于两个阶段的填充-预测管道，对每个管道单独训练，并在执行时根据样本对管道权重进行动态计算。这种方法在对比标准模型平均化方法时，可显著提升机器学习下游任务的性能和泛化性能。M-DEW在18个实验中显示出了其优越性，其中在17个实验中取得了统计学意义的性能提升，而在13个实验中提升了平均精度。

Specifically we develop M-DEW, a Dynamic missingness-aware Ensemble Weighting (DEW) approach, that constructs a set of two-stage imputation-prediction pipelines, trains each component separately, and dynamically calculates a set of pipeline weights for each sample during inference time. We thus extend previous work on dynamic ensemble weighting to handle missing data at the level of full imputation-prediction pipelines, improving performance and calibration on downstream machine learning tasks over standard model averaging techniques. M-DEW is shown to outperform the state-of-the-art in that it produces statistically significant reductions in model perplexity in 17 out of 18 experiments, while improving average precision in 13 out of 18 experiments.

We thus extend previous work on dynamic ensemble weighting to handle missing data at the level of full imputation-prediction pipelines, improving performance and calibration on downstream machine learning tasks over standard model averaging techniques. data.translation: 缺失值填充是许多机器学习问题的一个关键预处理步骤。然而，它常常被视为分类、回归或聚类等下游应用的单独子任务，因此没有与它们一起优化。我们假设将填充模型和下游任务模型一起处理，并对整个流程进行优化，将比分开处理获得更好的结果。我们的工作描述了一种新颖的自动机器学习（AutoML）技术，用于在缺失数据的情况下进行下游预测，该技术能够在推理时自动处理预处理、模型权重和选择，且计算开销最小。具体来说，我们开发了M-DEW，一种动态意识到缺失的集合加权（DEW）方法，它构建了一组两阶段的填充-预测流程管线，在推理时为每个样本动态计算一组管线权重。因此，我们扩展了之前关于动态集合加权的研究，使其能够在完整的填充-预测管线层面处理缺失数据，从而在下游机器学习任务中提高性能和校准，超越了标准模型平均技术。M-DEW已被证明在性能上超越了最先进的技术，其在17个中的18个实验中显著降低了模型困惑度，并在18个实验中的13个中提高了平均精度。

data.text: Missing value imputation is a crucial preprocessing step for many machine learning problems. However, it is often considered as a separate subtask from downstream applications such as classification, regression, or clustering, and thus is not optimized together with them. We hypothesize that treating the imputation model and downstream task model together and optimizing over full pipelines will yield better results than treating them separately. Our work describes a novel AutoML technique for making downstream predictions with missing data that automatically handles preprocessing, model weighting, and selection during inference time, with minimal compute overhead. Specifically we develop M-DEW, a Dynamic missingness-aware Ensemble Weighting (DEW) approach, that constructs a set of two-stage imputation-prediction pipelines, trains each component separately, and dynamically calculates a set of pipeline weights for each sample during inference time. We thus extend previous work on dynamic ensemble weighting to handle missing data at the level of full imputation-prediction pipelines, improving performance and calibration on downstream machine learning tasks over standard model averaging techniques. M-DEW is shown to outperform the state-of-the-art in that it produces statistically significant reductions in model perplexity in 17 out of 18 experiments, while improving average precision in 13 out of 18 experiments.
data.translation: 缺失值插补是许多机器学习问题中至关重要的预处理步骤。然而，通常被视为与分类、回归或聚类等下游应用的一个单独子任务，因此并未与它们一起进行优化。我们假设将插补模型和下游任务模型一起处理，并在整个流程中进行优化，将会比分别处理它们获得更好的结果。我们的工作描述了一种新颖的AutoML技术，用于使用含有缺失数据进行下游预测，它在推断时自动处理预处理、模型加权和选择，计算开销极小。具体来说，我们开发了一种动态缺失感知集成加权（DEW）方法M-DEW，它构建了一组双阶段插补-预测流程，分别训练每个组件，并在推断时为每个样本动态计算一组流程权重。我们因此扩展了先前关于动态集成加权的工作，以处理整个插补-预测流程中的缺失数据，通过标准模型平均技术在下游机器学习任务上提高性能和校准。通过17项中，M-DEW在18项实验中表现优越，显著减少了模型困惑度，同时在13项实验中提高了平均精度。

data.text: Missing value imputation is a crucial preprocessing step for many machine learning problems. However, it is often considered as a separate subtask from downstream applications such as classification, regression, or clustering, and thus is not optimized together with them. We hypothesize that treating the imputation model and downstream task model together and optimizing over full pipelines will yield better results than treating them separately. Our work describes a novel AutoML technique for making downstream predictions with missing data that automatically handles preprocessing, model weighting, and selection during inference time, with minimal compute overhead. Specifically we develop M-DEW, a Dynamic missingness-aware Ensemble Weighting (DEW) approach, that constructs a set of two-stage imputation-prediction pipelines, trains each component separately, and dynamically calculates a set of pipeline weights for each sample during inference time. We thus extend previous work on dynamic ensemble weighting to handle missing data at the level of full imputation-prediction pipelines, improving performance and calibration on downstream machine learning tasks over standard model averaging techniques. data.translation: 对于许多机器学习问题来说，填充值替代是一项重要的预处理步骤。但是，往往会将填充值替代看作是分散式任务，并且不会与下游任务一起作为一个整体进行优化，因此在实际应用中很少进行优化。我们认为，将填充值替代模型和下游任务模型一起优化，并且在推理时进行整体优化，将会比将它们分开优化得到更好的结果。本文描述了一种全新的AutoML技术，它可以在推理时自动处理填充值替代问题，并且可以在推理时快速计算样本中的填充值替代模型的权重，从而使得推理时的计算量减少了许多。我们的方法能够在18次实验中的17次实验中，实现了填充值替代模型的降维，而且在13次实验中实现了平均精度的提高。

data.text: Besides Mt. Everest and K2, the other 9 of the world's 17 tallest peaks on China's western borders are: Lhotse (8516 m, 4th highest), Makalu (8485 m, 5th), Cho Oyu (8188 m, 6th), Gyachung Kang (7952 m, 15th) of the Himalayas on the border with Nepal and Gasherbrum I (8080 m, 11th), Broad Peak (8051 m, 12th), Gasherbrum II (8035 m, 13th), Gasherbrum III (7946 m, 16th) and Gasherbrum IV (7932 m, 17th) of the Karakorum on the border with Pakistan. The tallest peak entirely within China is Shishapangma (8013 m, 14th) of the Tibetan Himalayas in Nyalam County of Tibet Autonomous Region. In all, 9 of the 14 mountain peaks in the world over 8,000 m are in or on the border of China. Another notable Himalayan peak in China is Namchabarwa (7782 m, 28th), near the great bend of the Yarlungtsanpo (upper Brahmaputra) River in eastern Tibet, and considered to be the eastern anchor of the Himalayas.
data.translation: 除了珠穆朗玛峰和K2峰，世界十七座最高峰中中国西部边境上的其他九座包括：洛子峰（8516米，第四），马卡鲁峰（8485米，第五），卓奥友峰（8188米，第六），加错康峰（7952米，第十五）位于与尼泊尔接壤的喜马拉雅山脉，以及加舒尔布鲁木一峰（8080米，第十一），布洛德峰（8051米，第十二），加舒尔布鲁木二峰（8035米，第十三），加舒尔布鲁木三峰（7946米，第十六）和加舒尔布鲁木四峰（7932米，第十七）位于与巴基斯坦接壤的喀喇昆仑山。中国境内完全位于中国的最高峰是西藏喜马拉雅山脉尼阿玛县的希夏邦马峰（8013米，第十四）。总之，世界上超过8000米的十四座山峰中有九座在中国境内或边境上。中国的另一座著名喜马拉雅山峰是南迦巴瓦峰（7782米，第二十八），位于西藏东部雅鲁藏布江（上游雅鲁藏布江）大拐弯附近，被认为是喜马拉雅山脉的东部锚点。

In all, 9 of the 14 mountain peaks in the world over 8,000 m are in or on the border of China. value.text: 受到腐败的诱惑
利益冲突的存在是由于其潜在的影响因素被感知为具有危险性

data.text: A conflict of interest is when a person or association has intersecting interests (financial, personal, etc.) which could potentially corrupt. The potential conflict is autonomous of actual improper actions, it can be found and intentionally defused before corruption, or the appearance of corruption, happens. "A conflict of interest is a set of circumstances that creates a risk that professional judgement or actions regarding a primary interest will be unduly influenced by a secondary interest." It exists if the circumstances are sensibly accepted to present a hazard that choices made may be unduly affected by auxiliary interests.
data.translation: 利益冲突是指个人或组织存在投资、个人或其他方面的利益冲突，即可能会因此而受到腐败的诱惑。利益冲突的潜在风险是与实际的腐败行为无关的，可以发现并有意制止，而不是等到腐败行为发生之后再制止。利益冲突的定义是：“利益冲突是指一个人或组织的一项主要利益可能会受到一项次要利益的影响，这种影响可能会使其不能够辨别是非，从而降低其判断或行动的质量。”利益冲突的存在是由于其潜在的影响因素被感知为具有危险性，从而可能会影响决策者的判断或行动，而不是因为具体的腐败行为发生了。

value.text: 即专业判断或关于主要利益的行为可能会由于次要利益的不当影响。

It exists if the circumstances are sensibly accepted to present a hazard that choices made may be unduly affected by auxiliary interests.
data.translation: 利益冲突是指一个人或团体有交叉的利益（财务、个人等），这些利益可能会导致腐败。潜在的利益冲突与实际的不当行为是独立的，它可以在腐败发生或腐败表象出现之前被发现并有意地化解。“利益冲突是一种情形，它造成了一个风险：即专业判断或关于主要利益的行为可能会由于次要利益的不当影响。”只要情况合理地被认为可能造成决策可能会受到辅助利益的不当影响，就存在利益冲突。

只要情况合理地被接受为可能存在风险

data.text: Schumacher has often been credited with popularising Formula One worldwide, especially in Germany, where it was formerly considered a fringe sport. In a 2006 FIA survey, he was voted the most popular driver of the season among Formula One fans. Throughout his career, Schumacher was subject to anti-German prejudices, especially from the British media. About his collision with Schumacher in 1994, British driver Damon Hill wrote: "There are two things that set Michael apart from the rest of the drivers in Formula One − his sheer talent and his attitude. I am full of admiration for the former, but the latter leaves me cold." In addition to Hill, Schumacher also had rivalries with Mika Häkkinen, whom he beat for his first World Championship at Ferrari and the team's first Drivers' Championship since the season, and Fernando Alonso, who ended Schumacher's five-consecutive titles in the 2000s. Despite only facing him during Schumacher's brief comeback in the 2010s, Lewis Hamilton is also seen a rival due to their similar achievements and driving styles, and cited him as inspiration.

data.text: In 1952, although Margaret attended parties and debutante balls with friends such as Douglas and Mark Bonham Carter, the set were seen infrequently together. They regrouped in time for Coronation season social functions. In May 1953, Margaret met singer Eddie Fisher when he performed at the Red, White and Blue Ball. She asked him to her table and he was "invited to all sorts of parties". Margaret fell out with him in 1957, but years later, Fisher still claimed the night he was introduced to her was the greatest thrill of his lifetime. In June 1954, the Set performed the Edgar Wallace play "The Frog" at the Scala Theatre. It was organised by Margaret's by now best girlfriend Judy Montagu with Margaret as assistant director. It drew praise for raising £10,500 for charity, but criticism for incompetent performances. By the mid-1950s, although still seen at fashionable nightspots and theatre premieres, the set was depleted by its members getting married. data.text: I’m from Texas and I’ve eaten steak all over the world. One of the most memorable steak dinners I’ve ever had was at Le Fonticine, Florence, Italy. We passed by the kitchen on the way to our table and I saw these massive steaks. There were three of us. All grown men. We ordered a 1 Kg T-Bone steak. When it was brought to the table, the owner of the restaurant carved it and served it to us. He had been serving us wine, salads, bread and olive oil and chatting us up. Made us feel super welcome. Everything, including the steak was exceptional.
data.translation: 我来自德克萨斯州，吃过世界各地的牛排。我吃过的一顿最难忘的牛排晚餐是在意大利佛罗伦萨的莱·方提尼。我们去餐桌的路上经过厨房，我看到那里的牛排都特别大。我们三个人，个个都是成年男子。我们点了一份1公斤的T型骨牛排。上菜时，餐厅老板现场切牛排，端到我们面前。他一直在为我们倒酒、送沙拉、面包和橄榄油，并跟我们聊天。让我们感觉非常受欢迎。所有东西，包括牛排，在那里都非常出色。

value.text: 基于软膏的障碍产品通过封闭皮肤和保持需要的水分来创建一个理想的皮肤愈合环境。

data.text: Before I dive into my go-to formulas, let’s discuss how Aquaphor actually works and why it’s beneficial for your face and skin. As board-certified dermatologist Dr. Adam Friedman explains, “Barrier products that are ointment-based create an ideal skin-healing environment by both occluding the skin and maintaining moisture where it’s needed.” In other words, ointments like Aquaphor act as a protective barrier that shields the skin from external irritants while sealing in moisture to help reduce transepidermal water loss (TEWL). It keeps the good stuff (hydration) in and the bad guys (bacteria and so on) out, thus creating an optimal environment for skin to repair itself.
data.translation: 在我介绍我的常用配方之前，让我们讨论一下Aquaphor的实际工作原理以及它对您的面部和皮肤有益的原因。正如董事会认证的皮肤科医生亚当·弗里德曼博士解释的，“基于软膏的障碍产品通过封闭皮肤和保持需要的水分来创建一个理想的皮肤愈合环境。”换句话说，像Aquaphor这样的软膏作为一种保护屏障，可以保护皮肤免受外部刺激物的侵害，同时封存水分以帮助减少经皮水分丢失（TEWL）。它保留好东西（保湿）并排除坏东西（细菌等），从而为皮肤自我修复创造了一个最佳环境。

As board-certified dermatologist Dr. Adam Friedman explains, “Barrier products that are ointment-based create an ideal skin-healing environment by both occluding the skin and maintaining moisture where it’s needed.” In other words, ointments like Aquaphor act as a protective barrier that shields the skin from external irritants while sealing in moisture to help reduce transepidermal water loss (TEWL). It keeps the good stuff (hydration) in and the bad guys (bacteria and so on) out, thus creating an optimal environment for skin to repair itself.
data.translation: 在深入討論我的首選配方之前，讓我們先探討一下Aquaphor到底是如何運作的，以及它對您的臉部和皮膚有何好處。正如經過認證的皮膚科醫生亞當·弗里德曼博士所解釋的那樣，“基於軟膏的屏障產品創造了一個理想的皮膚癒合環境，通過將皮膚封閉和保持水分在所需位置”。換句話說，像Aquaphor這樣的軟膏作為一個保護性屏障，保護皮膚免受外部刺激物的侵害，同時封鎖水分，幫助減少絲狀表皮水分流失（TEWL）。它保留了好東西（水合物）並排除了壞東西（細菌等），從而營造出皮膚自我修復的最佳環境。

data.text: When offering table food to a pet, everyone loves to see their eyes get big and the tail wag and the excitement and joy. The problem with table food is that a bite turns into a whole piece which turns into a small bowl which turns into their regular food. Table food is not a balanced diet and where it really makes a difference is when they are young and growing and need a balanced diet to achieve their optimum health and growth, and when they are older and start to develop kidney disease, liver disease, or other problems which REQUIRE restricted protein, fat, and other things. By then, all they will eat is table food and forcing a switch back to a beneficial diet like Hills Science Diet becomes impossible after years of eating from the table.
data.translation: 当喂食宠物时，很多人都喜欢看到它们的眼睛变大、尾巴狂拍、欢快起来，这样的场景让人感到满足。但是，宠物吃桌面食物的问题在于，一口咬下去就会变成一块块食物，这些食物会变成一个小碗，最后变成了它们的正常食物。桌面食物不是一种均衡的饮食，而且，它们最有效的作用时期是它们刚长大的时候，需要均衡的营养才能达到最佳健康和成长状态，而在它们老了之后，它们开始出现肾病、肝病、以及其他问题，需要限制蛋白质、脂肪、以及其他物质的摄入，这个时候，它们就只能吃桌面食物了，而在这种情况下，强制把它们转回到一种有益的饮食方式，比如希尔斯科学饲料，就变得很难了。这是因为，它们已经吃了很多年的桌面食物了，而且每天都要吃，这样它们的身体就无法再回到正常的状态了。

data.translation: 当主人把食物放在桌子上，宠物们的眼睛会变得圆润，尾巴会摆动，表现出激动和兴奋。但是，食物中含有的蛋白质、脂肪等成分都很高，这些成分会被宠物吞下，然后转化为整块食物，再变成小碗，最后成为它们的日常食物。但是，这些食物并不是宠物们的主要食物，也不能满足它们的日常需求，它们的营养并不均衡。当宠物们还在成长时期，需要营养均衡的食物才能达到最佳健康状态，或者当它们年老，开始患上肾病、肝病等其他疾病时，它们就会需要限制蛋白质、脂肪等成分的摄入，这时候，只吃桌面上的食物就不够了，而且随着时间的推移，强迫它们转而采食营养丰富的食物，就变得越来越困难。

data.text: “The scientists at Novo Nordisk deserve great credit for developing these drugs that have the potential to be a game changer for millions of Americans struggling with type 2 diabetes and obesity. As important as these drugs are, they will not do any good for the millions of patients who cannot afford them,” Sanders, chair of the Senate Committee on Health, Education, Labor and Pensions, wrote Wednesday in a letter to the drugmaker’s CEO. “Further, if the prices for these products are not substantially reduced, they also have the potential to bankrupt Medicare, Medicaid, and our entire health care system.”
data.translation: 诺和诺德科学家们为研发出这些药物而应得到极大的称赞。这些药物有可能成为改变千百万美国人患有2型糖尿病和肥胖问题的良药。桑德斯在致该药品制造商首席执行官的信中写道：“尽管这些药物非常重要，但对于那些无力承担费用的千百万患者而言，并不能起到任何好处。此外，如果这些产品的价格不大幅下调，它们也有可能使联邦医疗保险、医疗补助以及整个医疗保健系统陷入破产之中。”桑德斯是参议院卫生、教育、劳工及养老金委员会主席。

data.text: The placebo response, or the improvement in scores in the placebo group in clinical trials, is not only due to the placebo effect, but is also due to other phenomena such as spontaneous remission and regression to the mean. Depression tends to have an episodic course, with people eventually recovering even with no medical intervention, and people tend to seek treatment, as well as enroll in clinical trials, when they are feeling their worst. In meta-analyses of trials of depression therapies, Kirsch estimated based on improvement in untreated waiting-list controls that spontaneous remission and regression to the mean only account for about 25% of the improvement in depression scores with antidepressant therapy. However, another academic, Michael P. Hengartner, has argued and presented evidence that spontaneous remission and regression to the mean might actually account for most of the improvement in depression scores with antidepressants, and that the substantial placebo effect observed in clinical trials might largely be a methodological artifact. This suggests that antidepressants may be associated with much less genuine treatment benefit, whether due to the placebo effect or to the antidepressant itself, than has been traditionally assumed.
data.translation: 安慰剂反应，或者说在临床试验中安慰剂组得分的提高，不仅仅是由安慰剂效应引起的，也归因于其他现象，比如自发缓解和回归均值。抑郁症倾向于呈间歇性病程，即使没有医疗干预，人们最终也会康复，当他们感觉最糟糕时，他们倾向于寻求治疗，以及参加临床试验。在对抑郁症治疗试验的荟萃分析中，根据未经治疗等待名单对照组的改善，基尔什估计自发缓解和回归均值仅解释了约25%的抗抑郁药治疗中抑郁症得分的改善。然而，另一位学者迈克尔·P·亨加特纳提出论点并提供证据，自发缓解和回归均值实际上可能解释了大部分抗抑郁药治疗中抑郁症得分的改善，而在临床试验中观察到的显著安慰剂效应可能在很大程度上是方法学上的人为因素。这表明，抗抑郁药物可能与更少的真正治疗效益相关，无论是由于安慰剂效应还是由于抗抑郁药物本身，这与传统观点形成了鲜明对比。

data.text: The placebo response, or the improvement in scores in the placebo group in clinical trials, is not only due to the placebo effect, but is also due to other phenomena such as spontaneous remission and regression to the mean. Depression tends to have an episodic course, with people eventually recovering even with no medical intervention, and people tend to seek treatment, as well as enroll in clinical trials, when they are feeling their worst. In meta-analyses of trials of depression therapies, Kirsch estimated based on improvement in untreated waiting-list controls that spontaneous remission and regression to the mean only account for about 25% of the improvement in depression scores with antidepressant therapy. However, another academic, Michael P. Hengartner, has argued and presented evidence that spontaneous remission and regression to the mean might actually account for most of the improvement in depression scores with antidepressants, and that the substantial placebo effect observed in clinical trials might largely be a methodological artifact. This suggests that antidepressants may be associated with much less genuine treatment benefit, whether due to the placebo effect or to the antidepressant itself, than has been traditionally assumed.
data.translation: 安慰剂反应，即在临床试验中安慰剂组得分改善，并非仅因为安慰剂效应，还包括其他现象如自发缓解和回归平均水平。抑郁症常呈周期性病程，人们最终即使无医疗干预也会逐渐康复，而人们往往在情况最糟时求治疗并加入临床试验。在抑郁症疗法试验的荟萃分析中，基尔希基于未接受治疗等待名单对照组改善的估算，认为自发缓解和回归平均水平仅解释了抗抑郁药物治疗改善抑郁得分约 25%。然而，另一学者迈克尔·P·亨加特认为并提出证据，自发缓解和回归平均水平或许实际占据了抗抑郁药物改善抑郁得分的大部分，并临床试验中观察到的显著安慰剂效应很可能大多源自方法学偏差。这进一步提示抗抑郁药物所带来的真正疗效可能远低于传统假设，无论安慰剂效应，还是药物本身。

value.text: 在临床试验中，对照组的症状改善并非完全是由安慰剂效应造成的，而是由其他现象如自发痊愈和回归均值效应引起的。
而且在临床试验中所观察到的显著的安慰剂效应可能主要是由于方法学原因造成的。

Hengartner），则辩称，自发痊愈和回归均值效应可能贡献了抗抑郁药治疗的大部分效果，而且在临床试验中所观察到的显著的安慰剂效应可能主要是由于方法学原因造成的。这表明，抗抑郁药可能与传统认知中所认为的效果大相径庭，即它们可能仅仅是因为安慰剂效应而起作用，而非真正的治疗效果。

data.translation: 安慰剂反应，即临床试验中安慰剂组评分的改善，并不仅由安慰剂效应所引起，还包括自发缓解和均值回归等其他现象。抑郁症通常呈周期性发作，即使无医疗干预，患者最终也能康复。人们通常在情况最糟糕时寻求治疗或报名参加临床试验。在对抗抑郁疗法试验的荟萃分析中，基尔希根据未治疗的等候名单对照组的改善状况估计，自发缓解和均值回归仅能解释抗抑郁治疗带来的约25%的抑郁评分改善。然而，另一位学者迈克尔·P·亨根纳特则提出了相反的观点，并提供了证据表明自发缓解和均值回归实际上可能占抗抑郁药改善抑郁评分的大部分，并且临床试验中观察到的显著的安慰剂效应很可能大多是一种方法学的伪影。这意味着抗抑郁药相比于传统认为的真实治疗效果，无论是由于安慰剂效应还是药物本身，可能远低于预期。

value.text: 本项研究不仅提供了一个基准数据集，还开发了一个新的框架，通过利用细粒度多模态信息来增强多模态方面类别情感分析的效果。

data.text: The emergence of multimodal data on social media platforms presents new opportunities to better understand user sentiments toward a given aspect. However, existing multimodal datasets for Aspect-Category Sentiment Analysis (ACSA) often focus on textual annotations, neglecting fine-grained information in images. Consequently, these datasets fail to fully exploit the richness inherent in multimodal. To address this, we introduce a new Vietnamese multimodal dataset, named ViMACSA, which consists of 4,876 text-image pairs with 14,618 fine-grained annotations for both text and image in the hotel domain. Additionally, we propose a Fine-Grained Cross-Modal Fusion Framework (FCMF) that effectively learns both intra- and inter-modality interactions and then fuses these information to produce a unified multimodal representation. Experimental results show that our framework outperforms SOTA models on the ViMACSA dataset, achieving the highest F1 score of 79.73%. We also explore characteristics and challenges in Vietnamese multimodal sentiment analysis, including misspellings, abbreviations, and the complexities of the Vietnamese language. This work contributes both a benchmark dataset and a new framework that leverages fine-grained multimodal information to improve multimodal aspect-category sentiment analysis. Our dataset is available for research purposes: https://github.com/hoangquy18/Multimodal-Aspect-Category-Sentiment-Analysis.
data.translation: 社交媒体平台上多模态数据的涌现为更深入理解用户对特定方面情感的分析提供了新机遇。然而，现有的面向方面类别情感分析（ACSA）的多模态数据集主要集中在文本注释上，而忽视了图像中的细粒度信息。由此，这些数据集未能完全发挥多模态数据的丰富潜力。为了解决这一问题，我们推出了一个新的越南多模态数据集，命名为ViMACSA，包含4,876个文本-图像对，并附有14,618个细粒度注释，涵盖了酒店领域中文本和图像的分析。此外，我们提出了一种细粒度跨模态融合框架（FCMF），该框架有效地学习了模态内部和模态间的互动，进而将这些信息整合形成统一的多模态表征。实验结果显示，我们的框架在ViMACSA数据集上的表现超过了现有最先进模型，实现了最高79.73%的F1分数。我们还探讨了越南多模态情感分析的特点和挑战，包括拼写错误、缩写及越南语的复杂性。本项研究不仅提供了一个基准数据集，还开发了一个新的框架，通过利用细粒度多模态信息来增强多模态方面类别情感分析的效果。我们的数据集可供研究之用，详情访问：https://github.com/hoangquy18/Multimodal-Aspect-Category-Sentiment-Analysis.

value.text: 本研究旨在为研究人员提供一个基准数据集和利用精细多模态信息提升多模态方面-类别情感分析的新框架。

data.translation: 社交媒体平台上出现的多模态数据为更好地理解用户对某一方面的情感提供了新的机遇。然而，现有的Aspect-Category Sentiment Analysis（ACSA）多模态数据集往往侧重于文本注释，忽略了图像中的细粒度信息。因此，这些数据集未能充分挖掘多模态固有的丰富性。为解决这一问题，我们推出了一个名为ViMACSA的新越南多模态数据集，其中包含4,876对文本-图像配对，涵盖酒店领域中文本和图像的共计14,618个精细标注。此外，我们提出了一个名为Fine-Grained Cross-Modal Fusion Framework（FCMF）的框架，能够有效学习模态内外的相互作用，并将这些信息融合以生成统一的多模态表示。实验结果显示，我们的框架在ViMACSA数据集上优于其他最先进模型，取得了79.73%的最高F1得分。我们还探讨了越南多模态情感分析中的特点与挑战，包括拼写错误、缩略语，以及越南语言的复杂性。本研究旨在为研究人员提供一个基准数据集和利用精细多模态信息提升多模态方面-类别情感分析的新框架。我们提供本数据集供研究之用：https://github.com/hoangquy18/Multimodal-Aspect-Category-Sentiment-Analysis。

data.translation: 社交媒体平台上的多模态数据的出现为了解用户对某一特定方面的情绪意见带来了新的机会，但是现有的多模态数据集用于探讨词汇类型和类别情绪分析（ACSA）通常仅注重文本标注，而对图像信息的细节忽视了。因此这些数据集无法充分利用多模态数据的丰富性。为了解决这个问题，我们提出了一个名为ViMACSA的新的越南语多模态数据集，该集合包含了4876个文本图像对，其中包含了14618个文本图像的精细化标注，在酒店领域中，这些标注能够帮助我们更好地了解用户对某一特定方面的情绪。此外，我们提出了一个细节化跨模态融合框架（FCMF），该框架能够有效地学习多模态数据之间的内部和外部相互作用，并将这些信息融合到一起，生成一个多模态统一表示。实验结果表明，与现有的最优模型相比，我们的框架在使用ViMACSA数据集时的效果更佳，其 F1 值达到了 79.73%。我们还探讨了越南语多模态情绪分析的特点和挑战，包括语言复杂性、语法错误、缩写和缩略语等。我们的数据集可供研究人员使用：https://github.com/hoangquy18/Multimodal-Aspect-Category-Sentiment-Analysis。

data.text: The emergence of multimodal data on social media platforms presents new opportunities to better understand user sentiments toward a given aspect. However, existing multimodal datasets for Aspect-Category Sentiment Analysis (ACSA) often focus on textual annotations, neglecting fine-grained information in images. Consequently, these datasets fail to fully exploit the richness inherent in multimodal. To address this, we introduce a new Vietnamese multimodal dataset, named ViMACSA, which consists of 4,876 text-image pairs with 14,618 fine-grained annotations for both text and image in the hotel domain. Additionally, we propose a Fine-Grained Cross-Modal Fusion Framework (FCMF) that effectively learns both intra- and inter-modality interactions and then fuses these information to produce a unified multimodal representation. Experimental results show that our framework outperforms SOTA models on the ViMACSA dataset, achieving the highest F1 score of 79.73%. We also explore characteristics and challenges in Vietnamese multimodal sentiment analysis, including misspellings, abbreviations, and the complexities of the Vietnamese language. This work contributes both a benchmark dataset and a new framework that leverages fine-grained multimodal information to improve multimodal aspect-category sentiment analysis. Our dataset is available for research purposes: https://github.com/hoangquy18/Multimodal-Aspect-Category-Sentiment-Analysis.

data.translation: 社交媒体平台上多模态数据的出现为更好地理解用户对特定方面的情感提供了新的机会。然而，现有的针对方面类别情感分析（ACSA）的多模态数据集常常只关注文本注释，忽略了图像中的细粒度信息。因此，这些数据集未能充分利用多模态固有的丰富性。为解决这一问题，我们推出了一个新的越南多模态数据集，名为ViMACSA，包括4,876个文本-图像对，和14,618个细粒度注释，覆盖文本和图像在酒店领域的分析。此外，我们提出了一个细粒度跨模态融合框架（FCMF），有效地学习内部和模态间的互动，然后将这些信息融合以产生统一的多模态表征。实验结果表明，我们的框架在ViMACSA数据集上表现优于现有最强模型，取得了最高的F1得分为79.73%。我们还探讨了越南多模态情感分析的特点和挑战，包括拼写错误、缩写词及越南语言的复杂性。本研究提供了一个基准数据集和一个新框架，利用细粒度多模态信息来改善多模态方面类别情感分析。我们的数据集可供研究用途：https://github.com/hoangquy18/Multimodal-Aspect-Category-Sentiment-Analysis.

data.text: Deciphering the intricacies of the human brain has captivated curiosity for centuries. Recent strides in Brain-Computer Interface (BCI) technology, particularly using motor imagery, have restored motor functions such as reaching, grasping, and walking in paralyzed individuals. However, unraveling natural language from brain signals remains a formidable challenge. Electroencephalography (EEG) is a non-invasive technique used to record electrical activity in the brain by placing electrodes on the scalp. Previous studies of EEG-to-text decoding have achieved high accuracy on small closed vocabularies, but still fall short of high accuracy when dealing with large open vocabularies. We propose a novel method, EEG2TEXT, to improve the accuracy of open vocabulary EEG-to-text decoding. Specifically, EEG2TEXT leverages EEG pre-training to enhance the learning of semantics from EEG signals and proposes a multi-view transformer to model the EEG signal processing by different spatial regions of the brain. Experiments show that EEG2TEXT has superior performance, outperforming the state-of-the-art baseline methods by a large margin of up to 5% in absolute BLEU and ROUGE scores. EEG2TEXT shows great potential for a high-performance open-vocabulary brain-to-text system to facilitate communication.
data.translation: 研究人类大脑的复杂性已引起人们几个世纪的好奇。近期在脑-计算机接口（BCI）技术方面的进展，特别是利用运动想象技术，已经帮助瘫痪患者恢复了抓取、够到和行走等运动功能。然而，从大脑信号中解读自然语言依然是一个巨大的挑战。脑电图（EEG）是一种通过在头皮上放置电极来记录大脑电活动的非侵入性技术。以往的EEG至文本解码研究在小型封闭词汇库上取得了高精度，但在处理大型开放词汇库时精度仍有所不足。我们提出了一种新方法，EEG2TEXT，以提高开放词汇库EEG至文本解码的准确性。具体来说，EEG2TEXT利用EEG预训练来增强从EEG信号中学习语义的能力，并提出了一种多视角变换器来模拟大脑不同空间区域的EEG信号处理。实验显示，EEG2TEXT的性能优越，比现有最先进的基准方法的绝对BLEU和ROUGE分数高出大约5%。EEG2TEXT展示了作为一个高性能开放词汇库脑至文本系统的巨大潜力，有助于促进沟通。

data.translation: 解读人脑中复杂的神经网络已经吸引了世界各地的学者们的兴趣，而近年来，Brain-Computer Interface (BCI)技术的进步，特别是运用意识模拟技术来恢复运动功能，对于帮助残疾人重新恢复能够行走、抓取和摸索的能力，具有重要意义。然而，尝试从大脑中解读自然语言信号仍然是一项挑战，电生理记录仪 (EEG) 是一种非侵入性的技术，可以通过将电极放置在头皮上来记录大脑的电信号。在过去的研究中，人们已经采用 EEG 进行了大脑到文本转换，但这些方法仍然存在缺陷。我们提出了一种新方法 EEG2TEXT，它通过对 EEG 进行预训练，以优化对语义信息的学习，并利用多视图的深度卷积神经网络模拟大脑中不同区域的信号处理过程。我们的实验表明，EEG2TEXT 在 BLEU 和 ROUGE 指标中的表现远超现有的最佳方法，这些指标用于评估语言转换系统的质量。EEG2TEXT 的发展将有助于开发高性能的大脑到文本转换系统，这有望在恢复残疾人运动功能方面发挥重要作用。

Specifically, EEG2TEXT leverages EEG pre-training to enhance the learning of semantics from EEG signals and proposes a multi-view transformer to model the EEG signal processing by different spatial regions of the brain. Experiments show that EEG2TEXT has superior performance, outperforming the state-of-the-art baseline methods by a large margin of up to 5% in absolute BLEU and ROUGE scores. EEG2TEXT shows great potential for a high-performance open-vocabulary brain-to-text system to facilitate communication.
data.translation: 解析人脑的细微机 mechanics 一直吸引了数百年的好奇心。最近，Brain-Computer Interface (BCI)技术的进步，尤其是使用动作想象，已经为麻痹者恢复了手臂、抓取和走路的动作功能。然而，从脑信号中解析自然语言仍然是一个庞大的挑战。电荷电位记录仪（Electroencephalography，EEG）是一种非侵入性技术，用于通过放置头部上的电极记录脑电活动。对 EEG-to-text 解码的早期研究已经在小封闭词汇表上取得了高精度，但仍然无法在处理大开放词汇表时取得高精度。我们提出了一种新方法，EEG2TEXT，以提高开放词汇表的EEG-to-text解码精度。具体来说，EEG2TEXT利用EEG预训练来增强从EEG信号中学习语义，并提出了一个多视图转换器来模拟脑区域之间的EEG信号处理。实验显示，EEG2TEXT具有优异的性能，比基线方法高出5%的绝对BLEU和ROUGE分数，显示出巨大的潜力，用于高性能的开放词汇表人脑到文本系统，以促进沟通。

data.translation: 揭示人类大脑的错综复杂性自古以来便引起人们长久以来的好奇。近年来，脑机接口（BCI）技术取得了显著进展，特别是利用运动意象的方法，成功地恢复了瘫痪个体的运动功能，如伸手、抓取和行走。然而，通过大脑信号解读自然语言仍然是一个艰巨的挑战。脑电图（EEG）是一种无创技术，通过在头皮上放置电极记录大脑的电活动。以往的EEG到文本解码研究在较小的封闭词汇表上取得了很高的准确性，但在处理较大的开放词汇表时仍然面临高准确性难题。我们提出了一种新颖的方法，即EEG2TEXT，以提高开放词汇EEG到文本解码的准确性。具体而言，EEG2TEXT利用EEG预训练来增强从EEG信号中学习语义的能力，并提出一种多视图变压器来对大脑不同空间区域的EEG信号处理进行建模。实验证明，EEG2TEXT表现出卓越的性能，绝对BLEU和ROUGE分数明显高于目前的基准方法，提升幅度最高达到5%。EEG2TEXT展现出高性能的开放词汇大脑到文本系统潜力巨大，有望促进沟通。

value.text: 并且对于脑瘤检测特别有效。

data.text: Object detection algorithms particularly those based on YOLO have demonstrated remarkable efficiency in balancing speed and accuracy. However, their application in brain tumour detection remains underexplored. This study proposes RepVGG-GELAN, a novel YOLO architecture enhanced with RepVGG, a reparameterized convolutional approach for object detection tasks particularly focusing on brain tumour detection within medical images. RepVGG-GELAN leverages the RepVGG architecture to improve both speed and accuracy in detecting brain tumours. Integrating RepVGG into the YOLO framework aims to achieve a balance between computational efficiency and detection performance. This study includes a spatial pyramid pooling-based Generalized Efficient Layer Aggregation Network (GELAN) architecture which further enhances the capability of RepVGG. Experimental evaluation conducted on a brain tumour dataset demonstrates the effectiveness of RepVGG-GELAN surpassing existing RCS-YOLO in terms of precision and speed. Specifically, RepVGG-GELAN achieves an increased precision of 4.91% and an increased AP50 of 2.54% over the latest existing approach while operating at 240.7 GFLOPs. The proposed RepVGG-GELAN with GELAN architecture presents promising results establishing itself as a state-of-the-art solution for accurate and efficient brain tumour detection in medical images. The implementation code is publicly available at https://github.com/ThensiB/RepVGG-GELAN.
data.translation: 对象检测算法，特别是基于 YOLO 的算法，在平衡速度和准确性方面表现出了令人惊叹的效率。然而，在脑瘤检测方面，这些算法的应用仍然未被充分挖掘。本研究提出了一种新的 YOLO 框架，即使用 RepVGG 扩展的 RepVGG-GELAN（Generalized Efficient Layer Aggregation Network），该框架基于 RepVGG 扩展的扩散式卷积神经网络架构，并且对于脑瘤检测特别有效。该框架利用 RepVGG 扩展的卷积神经网络架构来提升脑瘤检测的准确度和速度。将 RepVGG 扩展到 YOLO 框架的目的是在保证检测性能的同时提高计算效率。本研究还提出了一种空间层次核函数抽样整合网络（GELAN）框架，该框架基于空间层次核函数抽样（Spatial Pyramid Pooling，SPP）的整合层，进一步提升了 RepVGG-GELAN 的检测性能。实验结果表明，在脑瘤检测数据集上，RepVGG-GELAN 的准确度和速度均优于最新的 RCS-YOLO，准确率提高了 4.91%，AP50 提高了 2.54%，运行速度为 240.7 GFLOPs。本研究提出的 RepVGG-GELAN 框架在脑瘤检测任务中表现出了良好的性能，可视为目前最佳的解决方案。代码可在 https://github.com/ThensiB/RepVGG-GELAN 公开下载。

本研究包括一个基于空间金字塔池化的通用高效层次聚合网络(GELAN)架构，进一步增强了RepVGG的能力。
，确立了自己作为医学图像中准确高效的脑肿瘤检测的最先进解决方案。

data.translation: 基于YOLO的目标检测算法，尤其是那些展现出在速度和准确性之间取得卓越平衡的算法，已经取得了显著的效率。然而，它们在脑瘤检测领域的应用尚未充分探索。本研究提出了RepVGG-GELAN，这是一个融合了RepVGG的全新YOLO架构，利用一种针对医学图像中脑瘤检测的重新参数化卷积方法。RepVGG-GELAN利用RepVGG架构提升在检测脑瘤时的速度和准确性。将RepVGG集成到YOLO框架中的目的是实现计算效率和检测性能的平衡。该研究还引入了一种基于空间金字塔池化的广义高效层聚合网络（GELAN）架构，进一步增强了RepVGG的能力。对脑瘤数据集进行的实验评估显示，RepVGG-GELAN在精度和速度方面超过了现有的RCS-YOLO，具体而言，RepVGG-GELAN在240.7 GFLOPs下，精度提高了4.91%，AP50值提高了2.54%。提出的具有GELAN架构的RepVGG-GELAN展示了有希望的结果，使其成为医学图像中准确高效的脑瘤检测的最先进解决方案。实现代码可公开获取，链接地址为https://github.com/ThensiB/RepVGG-GELAN。

data.text: Object detection algorithms particularly those based on YOLO have demonstrated remarkable efficiency in balancing speed and accuracy. However, their application in brain tumour detection remains underexplored. This study proposes RepVGG-GELAN, a novel YOLO architecture enhanced with RepVGG, a reparameterized convolutional approach for object detection tasks particularly focusing on brain tumour detection within medical images. RepVGG-GELAN leverages the RepVGG architecture to improve both speed and accuracy in detecting brain tumours. Integrating RepVGG into the YOLO framework aims to achieve a balance between computational efficiency and detection performance. This study includes a spatial pyramid pooling-based Generalized Efficient Layer Aggregation Network (GELAN) architecture which further enhances the capability of RepVGG. Experimental evaluation conducted on a brain tumour dataset demonstrates the effectiveness of RepVGG-GELAN surpassing existing RCS-YOLO in terms of precision and speed. Specifically, RepVGG-GELAN achieves an increased precision of 4.91% and an increased AP50 of 2.54% over the latest existing approach while operating at 240.7 GFLOPs. The proposed RepVGG-GELAN with GELAN architecture presents promising results establishing itself as a state-of-the-art solution for accurate and efficient brain tumour detection in medical images. The implementation code is publicly available at https://github.com/ThensiB/RepVGG-GELAN.

data.text: Recent work has shown the promise of applying deep learning to enhance software processing of radio frequency (RF) signals. In parallel, hardware developments with quantum RF sensors based on Rydberg atoms are breaking longstanding barriers in frequency range, resolution, and sensitivity. In this paper, we describe our implementations of quantum-ready machine learning approaches for RF signal classification. Our primary objective is latency: while deep learning offers a more powerful computational paradigm, it also traditionally incurs latency overheads that hinder wider scale deployment. Our work spans three axes. (1) A novel continuous wavelet transform (CWT) based recurrent neural network (RNN) architecture that enables flexible online classification of RF signals on-the-fly with reduced sampling time. (2) Low-latency inference techniques for both GPU and CPU that span over 100x reductions in inference time, enabling real-time operation with sub-millisecond inference. (3) Quantum-readiness validated through application of our models to physics-based simulation of Rydberg atom QRF sensors. Altogether, our work bridges towards next-generation RF sensors that use quantum technology to surpass previous physical limits, paired with latency-optimized AI/ML software that is suitable for real-time deployment.
data.translation: 最近的工作已经显示出将深度学习应用于增强射频（RF）信号软件处理的潜力。与此同时，基于Rydberg原子的量子射频传感器的硬件发展正打破频率范围、分辨率和灵敏度的长期限制。在本文中，我们描述了我们对RF信号分类的量子就绪机器学习方法的实施。我们的主要目标是延迟：虽然深度学习提供了更强大的计算范式，但传统上也带来了阻碍更广泛部署的延迟开销。我们的工作涉及三个方面。 （1）一种基于连续小波变换（CWT）的循环神经网络（RNN）架构，可以实现对RF信号的灵活在线分类，并减少采样时间。（2）针对GPU和CPU的低延迟推断技术，能够将推断时间缩短超过100倍，实现亚毫秒推断的实时运行。（3）通过将我们的模型应用于基于物理的模拟Rydberg原子QRF传感器，验证了量子就绪性。总的来说，我们的工作为使用量子技术超越先前物理限制的下一代射频传感器搭建了桥梁，配合具有延迟优化的人工智能/机器学习软件，适用于实时部署。

data.translation: 近期的研究表明，深度学习在处理无线电频率（RF）信号方面的应用潜力非常大。与此同时，在硬件方面，基于瑞德伯格原子的量子 RF 传感器正在打破传统的频谱范围、分辨率和敏感度方面的限制。在本文中，我们介绍了我们在 RF 信号分类方面的量子计算机学习实现。我们的主要目标是实现低延迟，因为深度学习提供了更强大的计算模式，但它也会带来延迟缓慢的问题，这一问题限制了它在范围更广的范围内的普及。我们的工作涉及三个方面。（1）我们开发了一种基于连续波域变换（CWT）的回归神经网络（RNN）架构，它可以在线对 RF 信号进行实时分类，并且可以减少样本点的采样时间。（2）我们开发了针对 GPU 和 CPU 的高效率推理算法，该算法可以在每秒数十万次的速度进行推理，从而实现了几乎秒级的响应时间。（3）我们验证了我们的模型在瑞德伯格原子的物理模拟中的可行性，从而为量子 RF 传感器的未来发展探索了新的途径。总之，我们的工作为将来的 RF 传感器采用量子技术打开了新的大门，并且也为具有低延迟的实时分类算法的普及提供了新的机会。
